googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Jimmie Martin
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thanks for the review, Mr. Martin
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Rons Old Time Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Cynthia Binder
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Ron was on time and  professional . I highly recommend him.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Rons Old Time Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Stephanie Moeller
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: I called to have my gas logs started. He and his helper cleaned the apparatus and lit the pilot light. Afterwards they could not replace the logs properly. I had previously asked for a price quote but he said he would find out. He sent his helper in with a bill of $375. Yes $375. I asked what I was specifically charged for. The helper did not know. Ron came in and said he was giving me a discount. I couldn’t believe this was happening. He became angry, threatened to disconnect my gas and said don’t pay me anything! He then paused and asked if I was going to pay him anything. I thought $125 was fair and paid him that.I had to threaten to call the gas company to finally get them to leave. I am also looking into seeing how to report him to the better business bureau along with anything else to warn consumers of his tactics.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText:
Nothing in her response is true and I called Spire gas due to her logs were missing a safety clamp and a gas cut off in the attic.
11 year old logs that she took apart not me.
If she wanted a free job she should have told me up front.
If your going to respond on here at least tell the truth.
Plumber and a helper for 2.5 hours $125.00
You dated your check 12-4-21
Maybe this explains everything your in the wrong month and year.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Rons Old Time Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: cindy craig
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Called Ron's to replace hot water heater and job was done in a couple days. Ron was very honest, informative and professional,  I highly recommend this business to anyone that appreciates an honest, professional small town business! Thank you again
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText:
I was glad I could help you with your plumbing problems.
Thanks, Ron Rothenstine
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Rons Old Time Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Lisa Baker
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Professional and affordable.  Ron was able to get our faucet at no cost because it was still under warranty.  Others may not do this because they automatically buy it from hardware store and then charge you double, without checking if it's under warranty first.  Highly recommend.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText:
Thanks for calling me to repair your problem, and thanks for the nice review.
Ron Rothenstine
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Rons Old Time Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Esmeralda Paap
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Ron came out right away to help with an emergency issue the septic system in the house we rented was starting to leak water out into the basement carpet. Luckily he fixed it and everything is working great! Definitely recommend him!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thanks for the review, I try my best to do everyone a good job.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Rons Old Time Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Julie Watts
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thanks Mrs. Watts , if we can help you in the future just call.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Rons Old Time Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Donna Edwards
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text:
Called. Ron's Old time plumbing , my kitchen was flooded. Ron came out himself and found my problem repaired my busted waterline, ron didn't Charge a service charge.
I will tell all my friends about Ron's. Old TIme Plumbing

plumberResearchFull.json:
### Business Information:

**Alabama Business Registration/License Details:**
- Rons Old Time Plumbing, Inc. is registered as a corporation in Alabama. The business is not BBB accredited, but it operates under the necessary licenses and regulations[1][4].

**Physical Location and Service Areas:**
- The physical address of Rons Old Time Plumbing is 272 County Road 1048, Clanton, AL 35046, although it is noted to serve the Prattville area as well. The business serves Prattville and surrounding areas[1][4].

**Hours and Payment Methods:**
- The business operates from 8:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m. Monday through Friday and is closed on Saturdays and Sundays. There is no specific mention of payment methods, but it is common for plumbing services to accept various payment options including credit cards, checks, and cash[3].

**Years in Operation:**
- Rons Old Time Plumbing has been in business for 46 years, starting on January 1, 1979[1][3].

### Services & Specialties:

**Types of Services Offered:**
- The business provides a wide range of plumbing services including gas line installation, water heater repair and replacement, drain cleaning, and emergency plumbing services. They also handle routine plumbing tasks such as fixing leaks and installing new fixtures[4].

**Service Areas Covered:**
- Rons Old Time Plumbing serves the Prattville area and surrounding communities[4].

**Emergency Service Availability:**
- The business offers 24/7 emergency plumbing services, ensuring prompt response to urgent plumbing needs[4].

**Any Listed Prices or Rates:**
- There is no detailed pricing information available, but the business is noted for offering transparent pricing with no hidden fees[4].

### Customer Reviews & Reputation:

**Review Summaries with Specific Examples:**
- Customers praise the quick response times and professional service. For example, one customer appreciated the prompt service for a faucet replacement and leak repair, noting that the owner, Ron, called back immediately and arrived within an hour[3].
- Another customer highlighted Ron's extensive experience and the peace of mind he provides, especially during challenging times like COVID-19 shortages[3].

**BBB Rating and Status:**
- Rons Old Time Plumbing, Inc. is not BBB accredited but has an A+ BBB rating. The business does not meet the BBB accreditation standards but maintains a high rating based on customer feedback[1].

**Common Customer Feedback Themes:**
- Customers often praise the quick response times, professional service, and the owner's extensive experience in the plumbing trade[3].

**Response to Reviews:**
- There is no specific information on how the business responds to reviews, as the profile has not been claimed by the business owner or representative[3].

### Owner & Staff:

**Owner/Management Information:**
- The owner of Rons Old Time Plumbing, Inc. is Mr. Ron Rothenstine. He has been in the plumbing trade for over 40 years and is highly regarded for his expertise and community relationships[1][3].

**Staff Qualifications:**
- The staff at Rons Old Time Plumbing are licensed, insured, and highly trained to handle various plumbing issues[4].

**Professional Certifications:**
- While specific certifications are not listed, the business ensures compliance with local codes and regulations, indicating adherence to professional standards[4].

In summary, Rons Old Time Plumbing, Inc., despite the slight discrepancy in addresses (Clanton vs. Prattville), is a well-established plumbing business in Alabama with a strong reputation for reliable and professional services.
aboutUs: Rons Old Time Plumbing is a trusted local plumbing company serving Prattville and surrounding areas. Our team of licensed and insured professionals specializes in gas line installation, water heater repair and replacement, drain cleaning, and emergency plumbing services. With our expertise and commitment to quality, we ensure your plumbing needs are met with precision and efficiency.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Reliable and expert plumbing solutions tailored to your needs.
sellingPoints: 24/7 emergency response for prompt resolution of urgent plumbing issues.
Transparent pricing with no hidden fees, ensuring you know the cost upfront.
Comprehensive range of services, from routine maintenance to complex installations.
